-- Megatron / Switchblade --

A frown flashes across Switchblade's face, quickly disappearing as 
it returns to it's normal easygoing empy self. "A traitor eh... 
that's not good. I don't think that it was a traitor however; I 
think it had something to do with this," He pulls out the piece of 
artifact that he still has, and shows it to Inferno and Perceptor.

"We'll see when Megatron gets out of the CR..." His words betray his 
impassive face, showing his desire not to have Megatron wake up.

Too bad for Switchblade.

------------------------------------------------

Megatron's CR lights flicker several times, indicating that the CR 
process is now complete. With a hydraulic hiss, the doors slide 
open, and slighly disgruntled, and very angry Megatron steps out. 
His optics like laser beams as he scans the surroundings, spotting 
Proto and Destructor.

"Grrr... bring Switchblade to me, I'd like an explanation." He 
clenches his newly reparied metallic fist, and stretches his legs 
testing out their functionability. They seemed to be working fine. 
<I must have been rather lucky... heh, to the control room now.>

Megatron walks forward past the two bots waiting for him outside of 
his CR chamber. "Bring him to the control room." Heavy footsteps, 
and irritated glow in his eyes only serve to further prove his 
displeasure.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> "When I exaimined the damage it seems the blast come from within 
our 
> own colony, from the storage bay I think. There may be a traitor 
> within our midst" Inferno explained.
> 
>

> > -- Switchblade --
> > 
> > The larger Pred yells at Switchblade and he shrugs slowly. "Yah 
> yah, 
> > whatever. I was following orders as his majesty queen Megsy 
ordered 
> > me too. I was uncovering artifacts from some crates in the 
storage 
> > bay. I found them all, and all I remember after that is waking 
up 
> to 
> > a horizontal light shining through the side of the storage bay. 
> > Looked like something burned a hole through the wall or 
something, 
> > but I can say that it was definately powerful."
> > 
> > With an exasperated look, "So, I say whatever Perceptor we can 
do 
> > nothing right now, so nothing we will do... We're waiting for 
> > Megatron to come around." Switchblade smiles and empty smile to 
> > Preceptor.
> > 
> > He turns back to Inferno, "So he got damaged, who pulled that 
one 
> > off, there aren't many that can take him down easily. What 
> happened?"
